FOR THOSE WHO GET PROBLEMS IN 'Wrong disc inserted' YOU NEED TO CRACK... HOW?

1. Open the crack folder (usually \crack\)
2. There is an extension. COPY TO THE ROOT DIRECTORY OF VICE CITY! (usually \Program Files\Rockstar Games\GTA Vice City) Replacing the old one.
3. Enjoy, but if you still have problems, try to mount the .iso
